resources.string: Chi può invitarmi nel proprio Network
Chi può vedere il mio Network
Chi può commentare i miei post
Aggiungi i post con il mio tag al mio Diario

You may set additional 2-Step Verification Contacts which will have to confirm you have become Digital Only once your Legacy Contact has notified us that you have departed and you became Digital Only.

You can set a period of time after which, if we recorded no activity on your Highlanders Account, your Legacy Contact has notified us that you have departed, and it has been confirmed by your 2-Step Verification Contacts (if any), you will become Digital Only.
Require Paper Certificate from your Legacy Contact to be sent to admin@highlande.rs in order to verify and confirm that you became Digital Only.
La mia App non funziona correttamente
Non riesco ad accedere al mio account
I\'m unable to connect an external service in Settings > Connected accounts
I can\'t find an Interest Page
Ho un feedback o una richiesta

Prova a risolvere il problema seguendo questi passi:
  • Chiudi la App sul tuo dispositivo;
  • Assicurati di aver confermato il tuo indirizzo email attraverso il link inviato via email alla tua casella di posta con oggetto \"Verifica il tuo indirizzo email\";
  • Apri di nuovo la App;
  • Se la App ancora non funziona, prova a eliminare la App dal dispositivo e a reinstallarla dal Play Store (i tuoi dati non andranno persi).
Se il problema persiste, inviaci le seguenti informazioni attraverso la casella sottostante:
  • Il tuo UserID (l\’indirizzo email usato per iscriversi alla App);
  • La marca ed il modello del tuo dispositivo;
  • Una descrizione del problema con abbastanza dettagli da consentirci di ricreare l\'errore.

Per favore, assicurati che tu non stia accedendo alla App con più di 5 dispositivi diversi:
  • Chiudi la App sul tuo dispositivo;
  • Assicurati di aver confermato il tuo indirizzo email attraverso il link inviato via email alla tua casella di posta con oggetto \"Verifica il tuo indirizzo email\";
  • Apri di nuovo la App.
Se il problema persiste, inviaci le seguenti informazioni attraverso la casella sottostante:
  • Il tuo UserID (l’indirizzo email usato per iscriversi alla App);
  • La marca ed il modello del tuo dispositivo;
  • Una descrizione del problema con abbastanza dettagli da consentirci di ricreare l\'errore.

Try troubleshooting using the steps below:
  • Kill the Highlanders App on your device;
  • Verify your email address by checking your Inbox for an email with subject \"Highlanders email verification\";
  • Relaunch Highlanders;
  • Access to Settings > Connected Accounts;
  • Re-enter your credentials to access the external account you\'d like to connect.
If the problem still persists please send us the following information in the box below:
  • Your UserID (the email address you\'ve signed up);
  • Your device brand and version;
  • A description of the issue with enough details for us to recreate the error.

Which Interest Page are you looking for?

Enter your feedback below:

Apprezziamo sempre suggerimenti e idee per nuove funzionalità!

Scrivi il tuo feedback qua:

Hai un\’altra domanda? Facci sapere!

Scrivi la tua domanda qua:

Highlanders is the solution to the sole problem we as humans consider unsolvable.

Highlanders give people the power to extend their presence forever.

Users may share, love, and comment on their own thoughts and memories, as well as do the same with posts from their Inner Circle and from their followed Interests and also pin their favorite contents for \"future\" use where \"future\" means that \'Wishes\' they have scheduled to be executed out of select triggers will continue to be fulfilled with posts and actions among their Inner Circle or their connected IoT devices, as they wished.

For more details, contact us via email at info@highlande.rs.

Glossary and branding

  • If you\'re writing about us, please refer to us as Highlanders — not \"Highlander\".
  • Our app, available in the iTunes Store and Google Play, is named \"Highlanders\".
  • Our tagline is \"Live forever, Love forever.\"
  • Our brand\'s primary colors are Orange: R242 G111 B33 (#F26F21) and Gray: R98 G99 B102 (#626366).

We are based in Midtown Manhattan, New York.

As we continue to grow, we are always looking for exceptional talents and bright minds.

To know more about our full-time or internship opportunities, write us an email to info@highlande.rs.
